title: Cécile Lochus
description:
Web designer's portfolio, crafted to reflect her creative universe while ensuring smooth navigation. I managed the full integration using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, orchestrated GSAP animations, and coordinated the project via Trello before deploying on Vercel.
Roles & technologies: Next.js development • Tailwind CSS • GSAP • Figma • Trello • Vercel

title: Audio-to-Text
description:
Online service that converts your audio and video files into text via simple drag-and-drop or URL import. Capture the essence of your meetings, interviews, or podcasts quickly and accurately. I handled all development except for the design.
Roles & technologies: Next.js • Tailwind CSS • AI integration • Node.js • Figma

title: Yeu-Milano
description:
Online portfolio for an artist, designed to showcase their work with subtle animations and a modern layout. I implemented the entire site in Next.js, enhanced interactions with GSAP, styled components with Tailwind CSS, and deployed on Vercel.
Roles & technologies: Next.js development • Tailwind CSS • GSAP • Vercel • ShadCN/UI

title: Histofy
description:
Personal project automating Spotify playlist creation: each month, Histofy gathers every track you've liked into a single playlist, so you can relive your musical journey without searching for each song. I designed the UI with an artist, built the integration natively (no framework), and developed the script interacting with the Spotify API, deployed via Docker then Vercel.
Roles & technologies: UX/UI design • HTML/CSS/JS integration • Spotify API • DevOps (Docker, Vercel) • Figma • Trello

title: SRMA
description:
Showcase site for the Salon Régional des Métiers d'Arts in Centre-Val de Loire, highlighting exhibitors, key events, and practical information (access, accommodation, workshops). I handled pixel-perfect integration of the design, ensuring clear, responsive navigation across all devices.
Roles & technologies: integration (front-end only) • HTML • CSS • JavaScript • Figma • Trello

title: Les Échappées à vélo
description:
Cyclotourism platform in Centre-Val de Loire, offering from May to October an interactive calendar of around sixty festive rides and bike routes. I performed the full design integration in WordPress and developed all dynamic features (ride filtering, calendar management, registration forms).
Roles & technologies: integration • PHP • HTML • CSS • JavaScript • jQuery • WordPress • Figma • Trello
